Name: team_assignment
Description: Teams must be assigned to projects

Name: worker_availability
Description: Workers must be available for assigned tasks

Name: sprint_duration
Description: Sprints must be within defined duration limits

Name: feature_priority
Description: Features must be prioritized based on business value

Name: story_points_estimation
Description: User stories must be estimated in story points

Name: blocker_resolution
Description: Blockers must be resolved in a timely manner

Name: role_assignment
Description: Workers must take on defined roles

Name: skill_requirement
Description: Workers must have required skills for their roles

Name: backlog_management
Description: Product backlog must be regularly updated

Name: sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Sprints must achieve their defined goals
